component.title: A new world is born
component.text: Your journey in the metaverse begins now

component.name: SectionText
component.title: Open your eyes
component.text:
Explore an extraordinary and vast universe, home to wonderful environments and mysterious creatures

Where will you begin your journey?

slides.title: Astralis
slides.text: Magically suspended in the sky, Astralis is the capital of the noble Celestials, the most prestigious race in Meta Life. Filled with process and knowledge, it is home to godly monuments, clear lakes, stylized buildings and architectural spaces on different levels showcasing beautiful nature.

slides.title: Astralis (2)
slides.text: Another angle of Astralis, home to the Celestials.

slides.title: New Heaven
slides.text: Home to the Cybers, a race of brilliant beings who found success in the metaverse after the end of the world we know. It connects rivers and seas through a magnificently modern coastline that outlines its futuristic skyscrapers and glass-windowed buildings. It was named after its purpose: provide a new place for Cybers to thrive.

slides.title: New Heaven (2)
slides.text: Another angle and view of New Heaven, capital of the Cybers.

slides.title: New Heaven (3)
slides.text: Another angle and view of New Heaven, capital of the Cybers.

slides.title: Neopolis
slides.text: Filled with incredible new technologies and hyper-modern buildings, Neopolis is populated by the Matrix Angels, naturally gifted with immense knowledge in computer engineering. From robotics and hi-tech to cybernetics and industrial science: Neopolis is the city of hackers.

slides.title: Capital 111 or C-111
slides.text: Home to the Roboters, Capital 111 is a reflection of neo-dystopian architecture. With tech noir elements of decor, neon lights and a dark ambiance, C-111 presents technology as a force that threatens our perception of reality.

slides.title: Aurora, the Golden City
slides.text: Aurora - derived from ‘aurous’ meaning ‘gold/golden’ - is a city of wealth and high influence. Capital of the Goldbois, its excentric architecture is said to have been whispered by divinities and is home to the craziest financial and intellectual abundances.

slides.title: Barad-mörr
slides.text: Capital city of the Burners, Barad-mörr is a place of fire and vileness. Heat and melt prevail as its population is obsessed with forging, building and developing their growing city. Myth goes that no-one ever to have gone was to be found again.

slides.title: Rust
slides.text: Known for its survival-of-the-fittest environment, it is where the Roughs call home. Dusty, iron-sighted, dystopian and deserted, Rust is prone to constant civilian anarchy. A reflection of the old world, in the metaverse.

slides.title: The Wildlings
slides.text: An unspoiled land of jungle, lakes, rivers, waterfalls and wild animals near Astralis. Ready to be explored by bold and fearless adventurers looking to find exceptional resources at risk of coming across dangerous creatures.

slides.title: The Swamps
slides.text: A dangerous area of wild creatures. Once a place of worship for divinities, but nature has reclaimed its territory and made it hard to navigate. Swamps, animals, magical plants, wild vegetation and ancient monuments. But a place of many ressources and treasures for whom will dare to explore.

slides.title: Roboters Garage
slides.text: A sneak peek into what happens within C-111, the capital city of the Roboters. A Mecha-Rhino is under construction, a power mechanical beast that very few can control.

slides.title: Mörberr
slides.text: A creature specific to the Burner environment with heavy armor equipment, and great forged claws. Ideal for tanking damage while hurting enemies back.

slides.title: Celix
slides.text: A stunning and extraordinary Celestial creature rarely witnessed by humans. Taming it and mastering its devastating spells requires time and dedication.

slides.title: Vitruvis
slides.text: Some say Vitruvis is a godly creature or a Celestial divinity. No one really knows but its ancient roots and magnificent aesthetics make it a rare occurence in the world of Meta Life.

slides.title: Squir
slides.text: Squir is a mecha squirrel escaped from the Cybers Mecha Factory and is now nowhere to be found. Some say to have spotted it in The Swamps where it hunts other creatures. Approach with great caution.

slides.title: Rhimo
slides.text: The Rhimo was made by the Matrix Angels and is built with a powerful mechanical body that makes it an intimidating companion and creature to deal with.

slides.title: Spyder
slides.text: The Spyder is capable of detecting movements from afar thanks to an internal AI-powered algorithm. A formidable skill for hunters.

slides.title: Ryena
slides.text: The Ryena is a rare creature often found in or near C-111, the capital of the Roboters. It roams around the abandoned neighborhoods of the city to find food, most often at night.

slides.title: Crust
slides.text: Crust can bite, crawl and tear out faster than most creatures. It typically lives in arid environments and is said to be quite invasive in the region of Rust where Roughs reside.

slides.title: ZERO 11
slides.text: The ZERO 11 motorbike is a product of Cybers engineering. It’s a light, fast and stable bike that is electrically powered.

slides.title: Buggy
slides.text: The Buggy is an all-terrain vehicle used mostly by Roughs in and outside of Rust, in desert areas and on difficult soils.

component.name: SectionText
component.title: Your new life
component.text:
Own pieces of land to use their ressources. Build your new home in the metaverse to settle in Meta Life.

Meet new friends, attend events, host parties. Have fun in Meta life’s rich social life.

component.name: SectionText
component.title: Experience the metaverse
component.text:
Gear up with weapons, travel the marvelous map of Meta Life on a motorbike or purchase a shiny new armor set.

Buy, sell, stake or lend your assets to other players. The possibilities are endless.

component.name: SectionText
component.title: A new economy
component.text:
Meta Life is powered by $METAL, its dual economy token.

Earn xMETAL by staking assets, selling on the marketplace and lending to other players. Swap it for ETH anytime.

Swap xMETAL for METAL - our governance token - to participe in the Meta Life DAO and help shape the future of your metaverse.

component.title: Join us now
component.text: Meta Life will be available soon. Discover the latest news on our social accounts.
